channel.title: Researches on Jinliang Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on Jinliang Liu

item.title: Submesoscale processes
item.description: Submesoscale fronts and filaments can modify the vertical mixing.

item.title: Flocculation dynamics
item.description: Flocculation affects the floc size and spatial distribution in the water column.

item.title: Oceanic Surface Boundary Layer Turbulence
item.description: The variability in turbulent flows to wind direction is different at different latitudes and in opposite hemispheres.

item.title: Water age
item.description: The water age distribution varies in response to changes in runoff and the tides.
